attributes.additional_details:
Disabled and Ill / Sick are still people, are still Human Beings.
To bring in BV's is draconian.
And will be stopping those having any kind of life / existence.
We should still be allowed respite holidays, specialist gym classes designed for help with maintaining mobility and stiffening joints.If we want a drink or smoke or a day out, why should we be banned just because we are Disabled? Benefit Vouchers would make life even harder and not worth living evermore on those who have otherwise nothing in life.
What is next? people will want to tax and ban Disabled / Sick and ill by the amount of air they breathe too. Ridiculous.

Say NO to benefit vouchers.
